B

BDD - Class in dd.bdd
 
BDD.Allocator - Class in dd.bdd
 
Binary - Class in memory
 
BinaryNode - Class in dd.bdd.components
 
BinaryNode.Allocator - Class in dd.bdd.components
 
Binder - Class in structures
This class is used to represent the binding between multiple nodes and an equivalent node
This class is used when performing operations between MDD to bind multiple nodes, for instance x1 and x2 to a node x that would be the result of the combination of the two nodes.
This is useful when you do not want to create many nodes that represent the same couple.
Binder.Allocator - Class in structures
The allocator that is in charge of the Binder type.
When not specified, the allocator has an initial capacity of 16.
BOTH - Static variable in class dd.bdd.components.BinaryNode
